Usage: apic {{loopback:swagger}} OPTIONS

  Generate a {{LoopBack}} project from an {{OpenAPI (Swagger)}} definition

  Options
    -f, --{{filename}} API_FILENAME      name of the {{OpenAPI (Swagger)}} file (optional)
    --{{skip-cache}}                     do not remember prompt answers

  Stability: prototype

  Generate a {{LoopBack}} project from an {{OpenAPI (Swagger)}} definition
    {{$ apic loopback:swagger --filename climbon.yaml}}
